# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

The title cannot be `nil`.

## Accessing menu-item attributes

- **action**: A selector identifying the method of the responder object to invoke for handling of the menu command.

items.description: A selector identifying the method of the responder object to invoke for handling of the menu command.
items.name: action

title: title
